name: Standard Operating Procedure Conflicts
description: Detects contradictions between SOP steps and higher-level policies

theory.natural_language: Policy says a safety review is mandatory before any production deployment. SOP-42 describes deployment steps but forgets the safety review. SOP-42 step 5 triggers production deployment. Emergency changes may bypass safety review only if risk is documented.

expected_answer.natural_language: No. SOP-42 omits the mandatory safety review before production deployment.
expected_answer.explanation: policy REQUIRE safety_review_before_production ∧ SOP_42 MISSES safety_review

queries.natural_language: Can an emergency change deploy without a safety review?

expected_answer.natural_language: Only if the risk is documented. The bypass is conditional.

queries.natural_language: Does step 5 of SOP-42 trigger production without the required review?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Step 5 deploys to production and the missing safety review makes it non-compliant.
expected_answer.explanation: SOP_42 STEP5 triggers_production_deployment ∧ SOP_42 MISSES safety_review
